reviews.review_msg: seems nice enough, but BEWARE 355 is ENTIRELY about electric vehicles, name of course is very misleading. Zero material on urban and transit topics. all readings provided written by prof as well which felt restricting. Content felt contradictory as we're talking about sustainable options, yet alluded towards everyone buying an EV. sustainable!?

Axsen is great the class was something that i really enjoyed. There was lots to cover so lectures feel dense in material. I did not like having to do a final paper and a final exam just pick one please. Other then that I would highly recommend REM 355.

Good professor. Lectures are a bit dull but the material is interesting. Fair midterm and final. Marking was also fair by the TA. Easy paper and group project. Lots of easy marks for participation, journal entries and discussion board. Not sure how he is through email as I've only contacted the TA through there. Seems like a good guy though.
